scripts.setup-app-deployment: az functionapp deployment source config --name azurehacks --resource-group azurehacks --branch develop --manual-integration --repo-url https://github.com/clonq/azurehacks-app
scripts.push-code: cd .. && git add . && git commit -m "wip" && git push origin develop
scripts.sync-code: az functionapp deployment source sync --name azurehacks --resource-group azurehacks
